mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chapter SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, novelId = #{novelId};
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, N.name AS extra__novelName, N.seriesStatus AS extra__series FROM chapter AS C INNER JOIN `member` AS M INNER JOIN novel AS N ON M.id = C.memberId AND C.displayStatus = 1 AND C.novelId = N.id WHERE C.id = #{id};
